name: Fidel: Dungeon Rescue
description: Fidel is a roguelike where you can REWIND. <br/><br/>A puzzle-crawler where you trace a path through monsters, treasure and magic.<br/><br/>No grinding, no filler, loads fast, quick to play, and there are many secrets to uncover!<br/><br/>(Don't forget to bark)<br/><br/><strong>Anniversary Update</strong> - Including Daily Challenges, OST (free!), gameplay improvements and even a hidden videogame!<br/><br/>
